originalTitle: Kenyan charged with luring young men to fight for Russia in Ukraine
title: Kenyan charged with luring young men to fight for Russia in Ukraine
content: A total of 1,000 Kenyans have reportedly been recruited to fight for Russia in its war against Ukraine.

originalTitle: Girl, 14, shot dead as South Africa's 'taxi wars' hit school
title: Girl, 14, shot dead as South Africa's 'taxi wars' hit school
content: Violence has plagued South Africa's highly competitive and lucrative taxi industry for decades.

originalTitle: Is Ethiopia heading back to war in Tigray?
title: Is Ethiopia heading back to war in Tigray?
content: Many people are again leaving the region of Tigray just over three years after the civil war there ended.

originalTitle: International doctors forced to leave Gaza over Israeli demands
title: International doctors forced to leave Gaza over Israeli demands
content: Seventeen aid groups have petitioned Israel’s Supreme Court after the government moved to ban 37 NGOs in Gaza.

originalTitle: Hillary Clinton calls for Trump to testify at US House Epstein hearing
title: Hillary Clinton calls for Trump to testify at US House Epstein hearing
content: The former secretary of state accused the Republican-led panel of seeking to protect political allies in probe.

originalTitle: India and Israel pledge to boost cooperation on trade, defence
title: India and Israel pledge to boost cooperation on trade, defence
content: Narendra Modi's visit to Israel has drawn criticism at home amid tensions over Israel's genocidal war on Gaza.

originalTitle: Danish PM calls snap election with Greenland issue centre-stage
title: Danish PM calls snap election with Greenland issue centre-stage
content: The issue of Greenland, which Donald Trump wants to annex, is likely to dominate the election campaign.

originalTitle: US-Iran talks end after 'significant progress', mediator says
title: US-Iran talks end after 'significant progress', mediator says
content: The indirect negotiations in Geneva are seen as a last-ditch effort, but the chances of a nuclear agreement are unclear.

originalTitle: Four convicted over spyware scandal that shook Greece
title: Four convicted over spyware scandal that shook Greece
content: In what became known as "Greece's Watergate", surveillance software called Predator was used to target 87 people.

title: A 'normal guy' doing 'brilliant' things - Lammens on life at Man Utd
content: Manchester United goalkeeper Senne Lammens says he is "just a normal guy", but his reputation is growing in an impressive debut season at Old Trafford.

originalTitle: How have Chelsea made biggest loss in English football history?
title: How have Chelsea made biggest loss in English football history?
content: Chelsea recorded a pre-tax loss of £355m for 2024-25 - the highest loss ever made by an English football club - according to financial figures released by Uefa. How did it happen?

originalTitle: Fans of richest PL clubs pay £74 per match as ticket revenue soars
title: Fans of richest PL clubs pay £74 per match as ticket revenue soars
content: Fans of the Premier League's six wealthiest clubs are paying an average of £74 per ticket for each match they attend, while ticket revenues are soaring, according to data from a new report.
